A set of top functions.

## Examples

Tabela com análise de frequências

```{r}

library(rthop)
library(dplyr)

dataset <- 
  titanic::titanic_train %>% 
  select(Survived, Pclass, Sex, Embarked) %>% 
  mutate_all(as.factor) %>% 
  filter(Sex != "", Embarked != "")

c("Survived", "Pclass", "Sex", "Embarked") %>% purrr::map_dfr(~ freq2(dataset, var = .x))

```
